[**It looks like most of the part-of-speech indicators are both preceded and followed by a hyphen. I put the hyphens in all of the entries at the beginning, until I realized that they weren't really visible on all of the lines. Thereafter, I just put them in where it was obvious from the picture. Also, some of the punctuation marks are unclear, like commas versus semicolons, and whether some of the dots on the page are hyphens or not. P2-added consistency, in the spirit of the writer, as requested by PM]
